org.opentcs.util.vehicles

Class SpeedController<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.vehicles.SpeedController<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The class used for representing speed values.

    public class SpeedController<S>
extends java.lang.Object
    SpeedController reduces the speed if too few following points are available. If a critical level is reached, the speed will be reduced, at danger level the speed will be set to zero. Otherwise the desired speed will be set to max speed.

    Call setNextFree(int) in the driver to set the following free points and calculate the new speed. Call getCurrentSpeed() to get the resulting speed.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S getCurrentSpeed()
      Returns the computed speed.
      int getLevelCritical()
      Returns the threshold/number of free points at which the vehicle must reduce speed.
      int getLevelDanger()
      Returns the threshold/number of free points at which the vehicle must stop.
      S getMaxSpeed()
      Returns the maximum speed.
      int getNextFree()
      Returns the number of free points.

      Returns the reduced speed.

      Returns the vehicle's ID.
      void setNextFree(int nextFree)
      Sets the number of free points.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      java.lang.String toStringShort()
      Returns a shorter String representation containing only the computed speed and number of free points.

                       S maxSpeed,
                       S reducedSpeed,
                       S noSpeed,
                       int levelDanger,
                       int levelCritical)
        Creates a new instance.
        Parameters:
        vehicle - Identifies the vehicle.
        maxSpeed - Maximum speed.
        reducedSpeed - Reduced speed for critical level.
        noSpeed - Speed for danger level.
        levelDanger - Threshold/number of free points at which to stop the vehicle.
        levelCritical - Threshold/number of free points at which to use reduced speed.
